## Blue Groper

Large fish are important in maintaining a natural ecosystem in balance. For example, only the largest fish and largest rock lobsters will eat the urchins, which are decimating Tasmanian and other kelp forests. Check out [*this story in the ABC magazine*](https://hyperlink.here) to learn more.
